name: ShalamovArtem
description:
I'm Artem Shalamov, a developer from Novocherkassk, Russia.

I am a design engineer, I work in CAD programs. Technical Assistant to the head of the Robotics Center. Well, and a bit of a programmer

I have confirmed qualifications in these areas:  
• Operator of unmanned aircraft systems;  
• Installer of radio-electronic equipment and devices of the 3rd category.
